9 Activities to Keep the Winter Blues Away

By Discover Peoria on

					Nov. 21, 2022
				






Tired of waiting out the weather this winter? Embrace the snow and get outside to enjoy the best of what winter in Central Illinois has to offer. We’ve listed 9 activities the whole family will be sure to enjoy. Bundle up and brave the cold to make lasting memories in our local communities!
 


Stick to the Classics


Grab a sled and find a hill near you! If you haven’t already staked out a great spot, head out to one of Peoria’s famous sledding locations:  Detweiller Park, Donovan Park, or Laura Bradley Park. If you’re looking for something new, try Mineral Springs Park in Pekin, or Morton’s Northwood Park. 
 


Try a New Sport


Peoria’s own Donovan Park is a frequented spot for cross-country skiing enthusiasts in the winter months. Meet up with members of the Peoria Cross Country Ski Organization, or head out on your own for an exciting winter adventure.  
 


Winterize Your Favorite Summer Activities


Missing summer? Modify your favorite activities to fit the cold! If you’ve got a fishing rod and freezing temperatures, consider heading out for some ice fishing. If you need to gear up, visit Bushwhacker. If you’re a novice, head out for the day on a guided ice-fishing trip. Herman Brothers Lake and Land Management offers guided ice fishing in various Fulton County locations, equipment and expertise included, sure to be fun for the whole family! 
 


Homemade Snow Cones!


Get creative with what nature has to offer! There are hundreds of recipes online that utilize fresh snow as an ingredient! Pick a few, find a patch of clean, untouched snow outside, and get creative in the kitchen. Snow cones, ice cream, cocktails, oh my!
 


Catch a Game!


Unleash your community pride and competitive spirit in the stands at the Peoria Civic Center, where you can cheer for the Peoria Rivermen on ice or Bradley Basketball on the court! 
 


Get on the Ice


If you want to get out on the ice yourself, visit the Owens Center in Peoria or the Pekin Veteran Memorial Arena for ice skating lessons and open skate sessions! If you want the authentic experience, head over to the Pekin Lagoon to skate outdoors! 
 


Exercise Indoors


If you’d rather not brave the cold, stay active indoors! Bounce off the walls at Elevate Trampoline Park, with locations in Peoria and East Peoria, climb to new heights at First Ascent Rock Climbing in Peoria, or splash around all afternoon at one of many indoor swimming pools in the area, including RiverPlex Recreation in Peoria, and Five Points Washington.
 


Get Crafty


Feeling inspired? Head over to Leo’s Art Studio in Pekin for a Paint and Sip hosted by local artist Terri Gambetti, or find your way to Fired Up in Peoria Heights to paint your own pottery and explore your creative side. If you’d rather stay indoors, explore the web for other fun crafts. We recommend you try snow painting. Simply add water and food coloring to an empty spray bottle, and head outside to draw in the snow!
 


Experience a Winter Getaway


If you’re in the mood for a bit of travel, consider spending a night in a cabin at Wildlife Prairie Park in Hanna City. Make memories at this unique location surrounded by nature. Enjoy outdoor activities, or get cozy inside.

Shop Fulton County

By Discover Peoria on

					Nov. 18, 2022
				






If you're the wandering type who aimlessly strolls through the aisles with an iced latte in hand and touching, well, almost everything, then we have the list for you. Shopping lovers unite—check out these locally-owned boutique shops in Fulton County.
 
CANTON
5th Avenue Fashion  {Canton}    //    5th Avenue Fashion is a charming boutique specializing in trendy women’s clothing and accessories. Sizing is curated for every body ranging from small to 5X.
 
Black Crow Candle Company  {Canton}    //    Black Crow’s candles are long lasting, slow burning, and scented to the very bottom. Each candle is hand rolled, coated and labeled resulting in a very primitive and distinctive aesthetic.
 
Free Byrd  {Canton}    //    Free Byrd specializes in women's clothing, jeans, blazers, shoes, candles, home decor, metaphysical items, and much more.
 
Georgia Rae’s  {Canton}    //    This charming boutique offers jeans, sweaters, jewelry, shoes, booties, scarves, hats, gloves, lotions, dresses, and so much more. 

 
FARMINGTON
Fashion Farm Boutique  {Farmington}    //    Home to women’s apparel, Fashion Farm Boutique is an adorable shop specializing in S-3XL options, so everyone is sure to find something they feel great in.
 
The Simple Things  {Farmington}    //    Located in historic downtown Farmington, stop by The Simple Things to secure all of your modern rustic farmhouse home decor. 
 
Star Metal Art  {Farmington}    //   Star Metal Art is a family-owned metal shop offering a variety of wall decor and signs. They specialize in unique pre-made signage and custom designs. 

 
LEWISTOWN
Now + Again Boutique  {Lewistown}    //    Now + Again is a women's clothing and accessories boutique displaying beautifully-curated quality pieces.
 
Crows Nest Mercantile  {Lewistown}    //    Crows Nest Mercantile is your one-stop shop for great gifts, beautiful home embellishments, fun accessories, and beautiful seasonal decor.

Front Porch Soap + Gift Co.  {Lewistown}    //    Front Porch Soap + Gift Company offers handmade soap, bath, and body products that you won’t find anywhere else. Products are made all naturally onsite.
 

Photo Reference: Fashion Farm Boutique

Illinois Made Makers from Greater Peoria

By Discover Peoria on

					Nov. 17, 2022
				












Every crafted item carries a little bit of the place and people that make it. The Illinois Makers program celebrates the small businesses whose uniquely Illinoisan style and creativity set our locally made goods apart. The following businesses and makers in the Greater Peoria Area have been recognized by the Illinois Office of Tourism for the Illinois Made Makers Program.
 
Be sure to check out these award-winning local Makers to experience the true charm of the Peoria Area.
 
Ardor Breads + Provisions  {Peoria}    //    Ardor Breads + Provisions is an artisan bakery and cafe in Peoria's buzzing Riverfront District
 
American Popcorn Company  {Morton}    //    America’s Popcorn Shop is a family-owned business that uses premium ingredients sourced entirely from the United States. The shop offers over 70 flavors of hand-crafted, gourmet popcorn, made daily.
 
BLACK BAND Distillery  {Peoria}    //    BLACK BAND is located in Peoria’s historic Warehouse District. Specializing in craft spirits, BLACK BAND is certified Organic, utilizing farmers throughout Illinois.
 
JK Williams Distilling  {Peoria}    //    Experience the smooth, warm flavor of JK Williams whiskey and bourbon made in small batches in pot stills. Just as you were converted to craft beers after sipping your first microbrew, you’re sure to be won over by the quality of craft whiskey. Group-friendly tours and tastings available.
 
Mackinaw Valley Vineyard  {Mackinaw}    //    The 86-acre property is a working vineyard and winery situated on a glacial moraine with a 30 mile view from the Mackinaw Valley Vineyard tasting room and decks. The vineyard features daily wine tasting, a gift shop with wine themed gifts and local foodie favorites, concerts, festivals, murder mystery dinners, trivia game nights, and chocolate + wine pairings.
 
Obed + Issaacs Microbrewery  {Peoria}    //   This historic, family-friendly is set inside a restored 1889 church in Downtown Peoria. Enjoy handmade craft beers and ciders paired with upscale pub fare with a twist. All craft beverages are produced right here in Peoria.
 
Riley’s Vegan Sweets + Eats  {Peoria}    //    Riley’s Vegan Sweets focuses on creating customizable 100% vegan sweets from scratch. located in Peoria. Not only does this trendsetting bakery make vegan treats but they accommodate multiple dietary needs like gluten free, nut- and dairy-free restrictions as well. 
 
Tanner’s Orchard  {Speer}    //    Since 1947, four generations of the Tanner family have welcomed guests to an amazing country farm experience. The orchard sports over 11,000 trees and 17 varieties of apples. They grow over 20 acres of pumpkins along with various other fruits and vegetables. At Tanners Orchard you’ll find a family atmosphere where fun is the order of the day. Expect wagon rides, a corn maze, farm animals, a market filled with unique gifts, fresh produce, specialty foods, and baked goodies including their famous apple cider donut. 
 
thirty-thirty Coffee Co.  {Peoria}    //    thirty-thirty Coffee Co. is an independent, locally-owned coffee shop with a singular focus on providing perfectly roasted and brewed coffee. The team works tirelessly to provide a unique and inclusive atmosphere for customers.
 
Trefzger’s Bakery  {Peoria Heights}    //    Established in 1861, Trefzger’s Bakery is a full-line bakery, providing the Peoria area with baked goods from breakfast pastries and cookies to cream pies to wedding and special party cakes. Fresh eggs, real butter, pure cane sugar, and the finest flours combine to give you the best bakery products available in Central Illinois.
 
The Nut House  {Peoria}    //    After 100 years in downtown Peoria, The Nut House has closed its doors. However, the sister store, Jane’s Sweet Addictions, will remain open with The Nut House’s signature nut mixes and candies.
 
Triple Dipple’s  {Chillicothe}    //    Triple Dipple’s, home of the Sweet Tater Cheesecake, is committed to creating triply delicious treats and delicacies designed to delight your taste buds and satisfy your sweet tooth. Every cheesecake is made entirely from scratch and from the finest ingredients. The secret ingredient to this AMAZING cheesecake is love:  love for the craft and a love for making your day sweeter.
 
Whiskey City Architectural Salvage  {Peoria}    //    Whisky City Salvage rescues architectural features and elements from buildings and saves them from the landfill. Consider this resale shop specializes in building materials and hardware from historic and iconic eras. Closed their doors in 2023.
 
Yeni's Palarte Mexican Ice Cream  {Peoria Heights}    //    Delicious homemade Mexican ice cream with unique flavors made with locally sourced ingredients.

Christmas Tree Farms in Greater Peoria

By Discover Peoria on

					Nov. 16, 2022
				






There’s no midwestern holiday experience more authentic than bracing the chill of winter to pick the perfect pine, spruce or fir. Not to mention, nothing says “happy holidays” more than the natural evergreen scent filling your home throughout the season.
 
Greater Peoria offers plenty of spots ranging from muddy and rustic BYOS (bring your own saw) farms to elaborate, Instagram-worthy holiday backdrops with homemade cookies and hot chocolate. No matter what holiday movie you envision yourself in this season, you’ll enjoy holiday cheer and beautiful scenery while finding your perfect holiday tree.  
 
It’s Christmas—keep it real! Discover these seasonal Greater Peoria locations to get your holiday tree.

 
FARMS
Blanks Evergreen Acres  {Creve Coeur}    //    U-cut holiday trees and fresh wreaths available. Open the day after Thanksgiving.
 
Cinnamon Tree Farm  {Brimfield}    //    U-cut holiday trees, pre-cut trees, shrubs, flocked trees, live pine wreaths, holiday decor, and grave embellishments.  Pre-tagging available the week of November 7. Farm opens the week of November 14. 
 
Grady Christmas Tree Farm  {Trivoli}    //    U-cut holiday trees with saws provided. Shaking and baling available. Pre-cut trees, fresh wreaths, holiday decor, craft barn, and grave embellishments available early November.
 
Lou’s Drive-in  {Peoria}    //   Pre-cut fresh trees and wreaths available at the Lou’s Drive-in lot. Open from 8am to 8pm seven days per week from Thanksgiving to mid-December. Operated by Red Thorn Christmas Trees in Morton.
 
The ‘Ol Dairy Barn Christmas Tree Farm  {Trivoli}    //    U-cut and pre-cut trees available. Stands, fresh wreaths, and greenery too. Open the day after Thanksgiving.
 
Pine Grove Farm  {Chillicothe}    //  U-cut holiday trees, fresh wreaths, and gift shop with holiday decor available. Open the day after Thanksgiving.
 
Red Thorn Christmas Trees  {Morton}    //   U-cut and pre-cut holiday trees available. Wreaths, swags, bundles of boughs for decorating, and garland too. Open on Thanksgiving.
 
Schaer’s Farm Market  {East Peoria}    //    Pre-cut holiday trees, fresh wreaths, garlands, and grave blankets. Open the day after Thanksgiving.
 
Talbott’s Christmas Tree Farm  {Green Valley or Manito}    //     2022 marks the 74th anniversary for Talbott’s Christmas Tree Farm! U-cut holiday trees with saws provided, pre-cut holiday trees, fresh wreaths, garlands, greens, and grave decor available. CASH ONLY. Open the day after Thanksgiving.

 
NURSERY
Green View  {Dunlap}    //    Pre-cut holiday trees with endless amounts of greens, garlands, wreaths.
 
Hoerr Nursery  {Peoria}    //    Indoor Christmas tree lot with pre-cut trees, fresh bundles of greens, garland, porch pots made in-house, fresh wreaths, Christmas Cactus, Poinsettias, Candy Cane Kalanchoe, Lemon Cypress, Frosty Ferns (a terrarium plant,) and holiday decor

Sheridan Nursery  {Peoria}    //    Pre-cut holiday trees, fresh wreaths, garland, and sprigs + greenery available for porch pots
 

Photo Reference: Cinnamon Tree Farm

Shop Tazewell County

By Discover Peoria on

					Nov. 14, 2022
				






If you're the wandering type who aimlessly strolls through the aisles with an iced latte in hand and touching, well, almost everything, then we have the list for you. Shopping lovers unite—check out these locally-owned boutique shops in Tazewell County.

 
CREVE COEUR
Artworks of Nature  {Creve Coeur}    //    Everything from rocks to rock and roll. Artworks of Nature specializes in crystals, metaphysical supplies, jewelry, decor, and more!
 
Warp Drive Toys  {Creve Coeur}    //    Warp Drive Toys carries collectible toys including Star Wars, Star Trek, Battlestar Galactica, Marvel Legends, DC Direct, MOTU, G.I. Joe Classified, Transformers, Hobby Master, Ghostbusters, Gundam and more.
 
Treasure Land Thrift Store  {Creve Coeur}    //    Find a variety of items at this thrift and consignment store, including both modern and antique jewelry, clothing, games, accessories, and more.
 
Sportscard Center  {Creve Coeur}    //    This is your spot for sports memorabilia and a full line of baseball, basketball, football, hockey, and NASCAR sports cards.

 
EAST PEORIA
309 Threads  {East Peoria}    //   309 Threads is a screen printing company and T-shirt shop specializing in custom screen-printed shirts, vinyl, and sublimation printing. The shop has an eclectic selection of graphic tees and a section of 309 gear.
 
Bear’s Bites  {East Peoria}  //  Bear’s Bites offers many options of locally produced and packaged dog and cat treats, bites, and more. They are 100% natural with no grain, additives, or preservatives. 
 
Enough Stuff  {East Peoria}    //    Enough Stuff is a completely secondhand store with artwork from local artists mixed with secondhand items.
 
Relics  {East Peoria}   //  Gift shop aiming to bring interesting things to Peoria that tell a story. Relics carries jewelry, cards, books, decor, vintage surprises, and plants.
 
Regulator Roasting Co  {East Peoria}   //   This local coffee roaster strives to bring out the best in each type of coffee through specific attention to detail throughout the entire roasting process. Stop in for coffee beans and tea blends.
 
The Picker's Daughter  {East Peoria}   //   Located in the Historic Four Corners District​ in East Peoria, expect antiques to collectibles, handcrafted to refurbished, farmhouse to primitive, and more from  80+ local vendors.
 
Vintique  {East Peoria}    //    Expect a unique and fun mix of vintage items and antique collectibles. 

 
MORTON
Floral Designs  {Morton}    //    This one-stop-shop for home decor has floral arrangements and charming items to spruce up your place.
 
Lulu’s On Main  {Morton}    //   This unique gift and artisan boutique is full of gifts, toys, women’s clothing, jewelry, candles, home decor, baby gifts, and all sorts of surprises.
 
Pudik’s Antiquities + More  {Morton}    //   Antiques, crafts, bags, Amish jams, kitchen items, furniture, decor and more
 
So Chic  {Peoria Heights + Morton}    //    With two locations you can find the perfect stationery, party supplies, decor, and more at So Chic. They also offer party planning services!
 
The Nook  {Peoria Heights, Germantown Hills, + Morton}    //    The Nook is your one stop shop for great gifts, beautiful decor, fun accessories, and on-trend apparel.
 
The Quilt Corner  {Morton}    //    With over 5000 square feet of floor space, The Quilt Corner has over 3000 bolts of designer fabrics, quilt kits, notions, gift items, and novelty merchandise. Classes offered covering skills like English paper piecing, embroidery, wool applique, and machine quilting. 
 
Thr3ads Boutique  {Morton}    //    This charming boutique is the place to find trendy and stylish women’s clothing and accessories. 
 
To The Moon And Back  {Morton}    //    This adorable bookstore has a wide selection of literary gems, games, toys, and merchandise to choose from.

 
PEKIN
Aryabellas Boutique  {Pekin}    //    Striving to help women feel and look better, find high-end women’s clothing at an affordable price.  
 
Classy Girl Boutique  {Pekin}    //    This unique gift shop in downtown Pekin offers a variety of charming clothing like Grace + Lace and Mudpie, purses, Crossroad Candles, gift items, and more.
 
Corner Curio  {Pekin}    //    Corner Curio has gifts, jewelry, natural products, Vanilla Bug Spray, and more.
 
Curvy Chic Boutique  {Pekin}    //    With positive body image and self-love in mind, Curvy Chic Boutique showcases stylish and trendy women’s clothing and accessories for women of all sizes.
 
Kountry Nook  {Pekin}    //    With over 50 talented vendors, Kountry Nook has unique gifts, home decor, furniture, crafts, candles, and more.
 
Little Ades Bicycles  {Pekin}    //    For 30 years, Little Ades Bicycles has been the community leader for all your bike questions, repairs, and gear. Find bikes for mountain, road, BMX, leisure, and children—You won’t be disappointed.
 
Pekin Bass + Bow  {Pekin}    //    Since 1993, Pekin Bass + Bow has been the local spot for top quality archery and fishing equipment.
 
Pekin Gun + Sporting Goods  {Pekin}    //    For over 40 years and 3 generations, Pekin Guns + Sporting Goods is the largest gun dealer in Central Illinois with over 2,500 in-stock firearms and ammunition, thousands of knives, boots and clothing, reloading supplies and much more.
 
Pekin Shoe Repair  {Pekin}    //    A family-owned and operated shoe repair and retailer for quality shoes and boots for over 50 years.
 
Time Travelers  {North Pekin}    //    The Time Travelers is a premier shop for vintage collectibles, glassware, furniture, and much much more.
 
Udry Jewelry  {Pekin}    //   Having served the community for over 40 years, Udry Jewelry provides appraisals, repair, and quality, custom-designed pieces.
 
TREMONT
Silver Spoon Boutique  {Tremont}    //    New to Tremont, Silver Spoon Boutique is a comfortable little boutique with the essence of Italy. Specializing in women’s apparel, shoes, and accessories. 
 
Tremont Gallery + Pearl Street Stamping  {Tremont}    //    Visit this shop for unique gifts, collectibles, craft supplies, and over 1000 rubber stamps, and card-making necessities.

 
WASHINGTON
Baker Street Boutique  {Washington}   //   This women's clothing and accessories boutique, located on Washington's Historic Square, displays beautifully curated classic pieces. The owner has an excellent eye for styling guests. Expect to star in mini fashion shows from the fitting room of Baker Street Boutique.
 
Boutique 309  {Washington}    //    Find boutique style women’s clothing at affordable pricing. Boutique 309 has a beautiful range of unique apparel, loungewear, accessories, hats, t-shirts, and more.
 
Brandy’s Bees  {Washington}    //    At this specialty store, find all beekeeping, garden supplies, and amazing items made from local honey.
 
GoldenFinch Interiors {Washington}    //    Goldenfinch Boutique is a home and gift boutique selling plants, décor, jewelry, apothecary and gifts. 
 
Holland's Mercantile  {Washington}   //   Central Illinois' original old-fashioned candy store, soda fountain, and toy store located on historic Washington Square.
 
Homespun  {Washington}   //   Homespun is located on the Washington Square and sells a variety of linens, candles, kitchen items and home décor items. Stop by for some gift or specialty shopping. 
 
Lori's Kitchen Store  {Washington}   //   Located on Washington's Historic Square, Lori's Kitchen Store specializes in kitchenware, cookware, cooking classes and more.
 
Lucky Charlie  {Washington}   //   Lucky Charlie provides quality first on trend, style, and good vibes for women of all ages. Expect a variety of stylish and unique items at this adorable women's clothing shop.
 
Sentimental Journey  {Washington}   //   For over 40 years, Sentimental Journey has been a staple for all-occasion gifts, home decor, jewelry and more! Stop by Washington's Historic Square to shop!
 
Step Back in Time  {Washington}   //   Explore 3 floors of over 45 unique dealers offering new and used home decor, furniture, antiques, vintage items, and collectibles. 
 
Washington Greenhouse  {Washington}   //   Washington Greenhouse sells unique garden accessories and a broad range of plants, trees, and flowers including a variety of annuals and perennials. 

Zeek’s Comics and Games  {Washington}    //    Zeek’s specializes in new comics, miniature wargaming, role-playing games, card games, and strives to accommodate all gaming hobbies.

Shop Marshall County

By Discover Peoria on

					Nov. 08, 2022
				






If you're the wandering type who aimlessly strolls through the aisles with an iced latte in hand and touching, well, almost everything, then we have the list for you. Shopping lovers unite—check out these locally-owned boutique shops in Marshall County.

 
HENRY
Fiber Faire  {Henry}    //    Fiber Faire offers sewing machine repair and service along with long-arm quilting services and classes. 
 
Henry Hometown Hardware  {Henry}    //    This locally owned hardware shop specializes in and sells all the tools you need to finish any DIY home improvement projects.
 
Occasional Treasures  {Henry}    //    This vintage shop sells new, used, and antique items like furniture, home decor, and kitchen essentials.

 
LACON
Lela’s Resale Shoppe  {Lacon}    //    Lela’s Resale Shoppe is the place to go to find new and used furniture. Fun fact: if you’re looking for a specific piece, the team here will be happy to find it for you.
 
Midwest Farm Charm  {Lacon}    //    Stop by Midwest Farm Charm to secure all of your modern farmhouse home decor and stylish clothing. 
 
Small Town Girls Boutique  {Lacon}    //    Small Town Girls is a charming boutique specializing in trendy women’s clothing and accessories.

 
TOLUCA
Miller’s Hardware  {Toluca}    //    Miller’s Hardware is your quintessential small-town hardware shop with quality tools and everything needed to finish any home improvement project.

 
WENONA
Ogden Creative Designs  {Wenona}    //    Whether you’re looking for custom clothing or custom SWAG, Ogden Creative Designs can personalize any item imaginable.
 

Photo Reference: Midwest Farm Charm
